feedback.title: Introduction to Anatomy and Physiology I

description.p: This is an opportunity for you to give us feedback on the "Introduction" module. We would be grateful for any comments that you have - your overall thoughts, what worked for you, what didn't work for you, what concepts you thought were explained well, what concepts you are still confused about, etc.
Note: Your responses will not be graded - this feedback is just to help us improve the course.
To help us gauge the amount of time students need to complete a module, please also enter the number of hours that you spent working on this module.

open_response.prompt: Did this unit help you progress through Anatomy & Physiology? Why or why not?
